properties.areaDesc: Red River, LA; Panola, TX; De Soto, LA; Shelby, TX; Nacogdoches, TX; Sabine, TX; Sabine, LA; Angelina, TX; San Augustine, TX
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 1:00AM CST until January 11 at 1:45AM CST by NWS Shreveport LA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Southern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
Southwestern Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
Northwestern Sabine Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
Southeastern Panola County in northeastern Texas...
Southeastern Nacogdoches County in eastern Texas...
Eastern Shelby County in eastern Texas...
San Augustine County in eastern Texas...
Southeastern Angelina County in eastern Texas...
Sabine County in eastern Texas...

* Until 145 AM CST.

* At 1259 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Center to near Rockland, moving east at 15 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Mansfield, Milam, San Augustine, Zwolle, Logansport, Hemphill,
Pineland, Joaquin, Converse, Patroon, Bland Lake, Neuville,
Rosevine, Macune, Shelbyville, Oak Grove, Pleasant Hill, Huxley,
South Mansfield and Noble.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for northwestern
Louisiana...and eastern and northeastern Texas. A Tornado Watch also
remains in effect until 800 AM CST for northwestern Louisiana...and
eastern Texas.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.
